snippet: New federal rules prohibit colleges from steering students to specific bank accounts to deposit financial aid....
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser notes new rules are in effect for college financial aid accounts; questions about campus bank accounts answered.
lead_paragraph: New federal rules prohibit colleges from steering students to specific bank accounts to deposit financial aid.

headline.print_headline: New Rules Are in Place for College Financial Aid Accounts
headline.main: New Rules for College Financial Aid Accounts
